rooms.name: Deluxe Double Room
rooms.description: Our Deluxe Double Room offers a harmonious blend of comfort and style, creating the perfect retreat in Istanbul. Featuring a plush double bed with an elegant tufted headboard, soft linens, and pillows, this room is designed for relaxation. Natural light fills the space, complemented by a chic color palette of soft neutrals and warm accents. A charming mural of Istanbul’s iconic Galata Tower adds a unique local touch to the room’s décor.

rooms.name: Deluxe Triple Room
rooms.description:
This triple room has air conditioning, flat-screen cable TV, private bathroom and balcony. The unit has 1 bed.
App. Room Size: 23m2
Beds1 x King

rooms.name: Family Room
rooms.description:
Featuring free toiletries, this family room includes a private bathroom with a hairdryer and slippers. The family room has parquet floors, a seating area with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, air conditioning, a minibar, as well as a coffee machine. The unit has 2 beds.
App. Room Size: 30m2
Beds2 x King

rooms.name: Single Room
rooms.description: Offering free toiletries, this single room includes a private bathroom with a hairdryer and slippers. The single room has parquet floors, a seating area with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, air conditioning, a minibar, as well as a coffee machine.
